website_summaries.verdict: A great, heavy-duty billiards table cover that is designed for smaller 7-foot tables.
pros: Cover is made of a thick layer of vinyl to keep dust, moisture, and small objects from damaging the table’s surface
Cotton backing will keep the cover itself from marking the table
cons: Colors vary from cover to cover
May not be accurately represented in the product picture

customer_reviews.title: Cat proof cover
customer_reviews.text: I have cats and this thing is an absolute piece of mind for our pool table. I originally purchased this cover because some other reviews stated the odor on it helped to keep their cats off the table. Well, my cats don't care one bit, BUT it is thick enough that I know nothing is going to make it through and damage the table. It is fitted, if that makes any sense. Some cheaper ones, like the one we had at first, was just a drop cloth, but this one has a seam that covers over the edges. Very happy investment.
customer_reviews.author: Arkodeus

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and protects my table from the cats
customer_reviews.text: The color is true to the image and it fits my table perfectly. I needed something to protect my felt from cat hair and nails. This is working perfectly. Now if they jump on the table its protected. And if we aren't using the table, it looks nice yet, unlike the blanket we were previously using.
customer_reviews.author: KatelynTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: if this is the right size for your table, ignore the others and buy this one
customer_reviews.text: I am using it on my air hockey table and it fits almost perfectly. All of the folding creases have not smoothed out yet but it still looks great. This is not thin cheap material like most I have seen. The material looks quality and has substantial weight to stay in place and protect the table. Measure your table accurately before ordering any cover. If this fits definitely buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Pictureman

customer_reviews.title: I used this to cover couch !!
customer_reviews.text: I have some rescue cats, and many are seniors. Could not figure out which one decides to make a mess on my couch. Could not find a suitable cover, was looking at tarps, futon covers etc for something that would protect my couch and WALLA. THIS IS IT!!!! Looks pretty sharp. You might have to put a super giant throw to cover the rest, for color reasons, but this is the best and least expensive slipcover for a couch I have ever seen. Looks classy, expensive, is thick and easy to clean! It smells at first, so is good to air it out before use.
customer_reviews.author: JBGAL

customer_reviews.title: Return was easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought wrong size first (7ft) Returned it and bought the right size (8ft) Very happy with quality for the price and had no difficulties with returning the first one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shirley Heselton

customer_reviews.title: Protection, looks, easy off/on, value
customer_reviews.text: A substantial cover. I believe the cloth backing will increase the durability. The weight is perfect... heavy enough to provide excellent protection (even from our 2 cats) yet not so heavy as to preclude fairly easy removal and replacement. Seems like more quality than the price would suggest. And it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Mitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool table cover for the budget in mind,
customer_reviews.text: This Pool table cover is very nice,and fits my table perfect. Can't understand any of the low ratings. The cover is not some flimsy little piece of junk it's does a very good job. Besides what do you expect for $35.95. Great cover . You won't regret it. Unless you expecting top dollar with a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Burnette

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size or two larger
customer_reviews.text: Way too small but quality seemed great. I sent it back and purchased directly from a repair guy at a MUCH higher price. If I had it to do over, I would have just purchased this one in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL MCDUELL

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade for my pool table
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from the simple sheet with the weighted corners that I was using on my pool table. The fit is excellent, and the appearance is quite handsome, almost like leather, and has easily repelled a number of spills already. It is of course heavier than the simple sheet -type cover, so a small child would naturally have a little bit more difficulty uncovering the table, but I don't want them playing without being able to keep an eye on them anyway, so no issue there.
customer_reviews.author: T-Rex

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover and fit my 7 1/2 foot table perfect, was worried it would not fit but seen another review that said it would. Great quality for a good price. A little wrinkled but the longer it is on the table the more it will smooth out.
customer_reviews.author: DRK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover for 7' table
customer_reviews.text: This cover (for a 7' table) fits perfectly. My table's external dimensions are 48" x 87". There's only 1-2" extra on all sides before the downward sides begin. And those downward sides (about 6" length) are very nice. And it's nice and thick - it just feels great. Looks great too. Definite recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy feel to this cover, After a few hours in the sun most of the fold lines went away. fits the table well. No complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend getting this if you have a pool table and ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits are 7 ft slate pool table perfectly. We get many compliments from our friends about it. I definitely recommend getting this if you have a pool table and you're tired of cleaning it off.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Fit great, has kept the table safe from spills, possible tears and kept dust off the felt. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: hittgurl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality - Fits Like A Glove
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up on this deep green, heavy duty cover. Excellent Quality - fits like a glove on my 7 foot table.
customer_reviews.author: George R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this fitted cover! We are so glad we chose this one over some of the others. Fit is great and offers great protection from spills or dust.
customer_reviews.author: RichB

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made cover with plenty of room for a large frame. I docked a star only because I felt like it was too short in skirt length. I felt it could have used at least a few more inches.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: it was *NOT* the pretty, mottled amber-brown shown
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item based on the color shown....when it arrived...it was *NOT* the pretty, mottled amber-brown shown...it was a single-color, dark muddy brown...that is *really* ugly. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Delisle

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought these. Looks great. Fit is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: amyb

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, seemingly well constructed, fits well. Can't speak to durability yet but don't see any reason to doubt it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool table supplies
customer_reviews.text: I recently reclaimed my pool table and all my brushes, new cover, supplies and felt cleaners needed replacement. Great prices and one stop shopping for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love it even Cat approved.. I have cherry wood furniture and i worried the cats would ruin it.. Now with these covers i can let them play and not be concerned ...
customer_reviews.author: char skeels

customer_reviews.title: A Super Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is perfect in every aspect! It fits and looks beautiful covering our pool table! Also, it is very sturdy and should last a long, long time. I could not be happier as it is just what I hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good item but
customer_reviews.text: Good item for the price. My cat now sleep on the pool table and does not scratch it. I Wish it was a bit thicker to fully protect against my cat claws, but overall it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because our kitten kept jumping on our pool table and we didn’t want her to scratch it all up. It looks very nice and is durable. Plus I haven’t seen the cat on the table since we put it on! Very good product and very pleased with this purchase. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got it covered.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy for the money. Protects well and is very durable. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Don Wirick

customer_reviews.title: Oversized but good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit oversized. I would have likes if it had fit better but it is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Avitia

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: For being so inexpensive, I was pleasantly surprised by the thickness of the material and how nice it looks.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Really Heavy Duty.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is made of thick vinyl. It's not just a cheap plastic cover. Buy it. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: George Leroy Tirebiter

customer_reviews.title: WRINKLE TOWN
customer_reviews.text: The wrinkles man, they’re everywhere and they look terrible. Tried to steam them out, can’t. Ugh. It’s a quality cover, I just can’t ignore the deeply defined wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised...
customer_reviews.text: Such a great quality for the price!!! I was expecting a light duty kinda cheap cover and was delightfully surprised at how well made and nice this cover was. I got the Amber which is a dark brown. It looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Maggz

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Pool table cover shipped quickly and arrived on schedule. Cover fits table perfectly and is indeed a heavy duty cover - no comparison with the cheap vinyl non-fitted covers. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and heavy cover.  Fits perfect on a 7' valley bar style pool table
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and heavy cover. Fits perfect on a 7' valley bar style pool table
customer_reviews.author: kall

customer_reviews.title: Great coverv
customer_reviews.text: Great cover, heavy duty, fits great and looks awesome. Highly recommend, best cover for the price. Very much satisfied thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and Looks Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is heavy duty and looks really nice! It fit our 7.5 pool table nicely and probably would fit an 8 foot as well. Does a great job of protecting from cats!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Knutson

customer_reviews.title: OMG The BEST cover for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My table was a little over 7 ft and this fits like a glove, looks terrific and my cats and foster kittens have left the table alone since I put in on there!! Would recommend to anyone!! I also loved the color (Amber). And yes, I have to say after reading all the "smell reviews", I really don't know what all the fuss is about! I mean come on, this isn't leather! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ceree

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavier cover, actually nicer than I expected but I was disappointed that it had a flaw. It looks really nice on our pool table from a distance. Since our table is in our basement and that isn't completely finished off, the flaw is not an issue but still disappointing. The cover drapes over the sides a good 10 inches. I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Brett

customer_reviews.title: ... little oversized on my 7 footer but still works great.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little oversized on my 7 footer but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN GARLAND

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Olhausen 7 foot table perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Great value. Others mentioned creases from the folds, but that hasn't bothered me. I'm thinking of using a hair dryer on a low setting to smooth them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, it's much thicker than the original cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, it's much thicker than the original cover that was provided with the purchase of my pool table. I'm confident this cover will hold up to spills. Would have given it 5 stars but the creases are a bit difficult to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, great quality, great seller!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is so great!!! I was amazed at the quality and it looks classy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tisha Kareck

customer_reviews.title: This is a good cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is slightly longer, maybe 3-4 inches on each end, than my 7 foot Brunswick table but not so much that it looks bad. It is a nice thickness and doesn't look cheap at all. It is pretty easy to put on or remove and the color is close to the table color except a bit lighter. So far so good and the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my Valley 7' table. High quality, strong material. Looks like it was customized for my table.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Great look, very durable and high quality. Only issue is fold/creases don't go away.
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 7' pool table very well. The only issue is it has maintained the folds from packaging after about 3 months of use. It looks great, is very well made, etc. Just wish there was a way to iron out the wrinkles/folds for a cleaner look.
customer_reviews.author: MS.UT

customer_reviews.title: Wont fit standard table
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said they would fit 8foot table , too small for an average pool table
customer_reviews.author: Jeep guy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, fit our 7' table perfectly, better than the thin plastic cover we previously had.
customer_reviews.author: slidersrus

customer_reviews.title: We have a 7ft pool table but it didn't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a 7ft pool table but it didn't fit. I ended up cutting the sides. We were worried that our cat would ruin the felt.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Claes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Valley 88 (6.5 ft)
customer_reviews.text: Looks and fits great on my 1968 Valley 88"x44" (6.5 ft playing surface) Nothing not to like. I was skeptical at time of purchase re: fitting reviews and color, but I couldn't be happier with the $ spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty, doesn't smell that bad
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my table really well and looks pretty good. Seems very tough and I don't think my cats will be able to mess it up or pull it off, like they did with my last pool table cover. After reading other reviews and knowing what vinyl can be like, I was expecting to air this cover outside for a few days, but it was really fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katroshka

customer_reviews.title: ... read the reviews and tried to pick out the best cover for the best price
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and tried to pick out the best cover for the best price. I was worried since my table is 7.5 foot table so was not sure if it would hang right on my table, but it fits perfectly and looks so nice! from the picture I would not tell that there was a seam that went around the edges so that if falls nicely around the sides and corners. It looks great! .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks great and expensive! It fits pretty good on my 7 foot table.
customer_reviews.author: withtude

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 7 foot Vally coin operated table great looks good too. To get rid of the wringles just put it in the dryer with damp towel on low heat. Trues out great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick cover to protect a pool table
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick cover to protect a pool table. The last one we had was thin and our cats tore it to shreds by just playing on it. This one has held up to the cats and stays on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Toes!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you - now the cats aren't distroying the table
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Great pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: This pool table is a great buy. It does smell to high heaven when you first open the package and spread it out, but that smell fades quickly. The underside is soft enough to not scratch or otherwise harm your table and it's waterproof to prevent any damage. I've only had it about a month so far, but it seems like a great buy to me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected. Fits my Connelly 7 foot table nearly perfectly. Heavy duty material. Yes there is a vinyl smell when you take it out of the package but that is to be expected and the smell faded rapidly. Very happy with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: schirminator

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised by the quality of this cover. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of this cover. Fit my 7ft table with margin, but not too loose either. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbs_73

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover and great value.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great. It looks like a very expensive cover, fits perfectly and is easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: jabee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cover works great stayed in place so far been good.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality good value. Slightly oversized for my 7 foot table ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality good value. Slightly oversized for my 7 foot table but overall it looks way better then the thin green tarp like cover I had.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty game table cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty cover on our game table on the patio. Normally all sort of stuff ends up on top of game table. Thanks to this cover it protects the table and has held up real well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Serves Its Purpose and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and color is accurately represented. Nice quality material and has the cut of it has the ability to fit slight differences in size which is also a nice perk. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Vince A.

customer_reviews.title: South Carolina Fats
customer_reviews.text: The Pool table Cover came within days of ordering. It is a very nice Amber color and fits my 7 foot table. One thing nice is that Lilly (my white long haired cat) does not like it. She has not been on the table since I put the cover on it. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: South Carolina Fats

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems fine, unfortunately I ordered burgundy and clearly received brown
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems fine, unfortunately I ordered burgundy and clearly received brown. Not worth returning, but not really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels like it will last awhile. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Nels Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Nice and thick. Amazed at quality for the price. Brown is lighter than I preferred but it looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Becky9

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cover! Fit perfectly, rugged, can wipe it down and I really liked the color.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe G

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for Valley Pool table (reconditioned coin op bar ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for Valley Pool table (reconditioned coin op bar table). Fits our table which has an overall length of 87 inches and width of 50 1/2 inches.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A Super nice pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the color, it is a rich color amber/brown. It fits well, and is very well made. Thick, with fitting type corners but there is a couple of extra inches on each side with the 7 ft cover. But it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: texasex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cover
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate to buy this; it works great, looks great and the cats don't like to sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K. Allgeier

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: worked, fit, seems well built, folds & any smell went away after about a week.
customer_reviews.author: campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Great for protection of animals, dust etc because it is thick material! Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: love it very durable unlike the hardware store
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy from anywhere else this is the ONE, love it very durable unlike the hardware store brands
customer_reviews.author: Daryel

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and I love the look of it! Much nicer looking than the cheap green plastic cover I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover for my 7ft Pool table. Good material, feels like it will last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Really nice table cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy material. Protects pool table, and easy to install on table.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at a good price... What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: DocBob

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty cover
customer_reviews.text: A very nice cover! The molded corners hold it in place really well. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, it is super durable and fit our 7 food table perfectly. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bigness

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Pool Table Cover
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but fit my 7' table perfectly and hangs over the rails too. Keeps dust off. The material is a nice looking vinyl and for the price I was surprised by how thick and it was. Thinking about getting a table insert to go underneath it so we can use the table for potlucks etc... without worrying about spills.
customer_reviews.author: Staddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. It looks great on the table. I don't know if it water proof are not, and I hope I never find out, but it look like I paid $100+ for it. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Houston

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too loose
customer_reviews.text: This cover is soft fells and looks good. However, It's too large for a 7 foot table and dangels from allsides. Would have been good if the manufacturer add a fitting rubber band similat to the bit fitting sheets
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed I. Salem

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to cover a Dynamo 7 ft table at our local American Legion. Cover is made from quality heavy material and fit the table like it was made for it.
customer_reviews.author: lmmare

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. Excellent colors. High quality. Not having the "crease" issue that others are speaking about. Serves it's purpose. Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Last Dollar

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover to keep my cat off my new pool table and to disguise the table that sits in the middle of my great room. It definitely surpassed my expectations. It is attractive and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Takes along time for the folds to come out. Good Quality
customer_reviews.author: kcrainer

customer_reviews.title: ... our 7' pool table perfectly and keeps the table nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits our 7' pool table perfectly and keeps the table nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Little tight on a 7-foot Diamond table
customer_reviews.text: We have a 7-foot Diamond table, and this cover is a tad too small. It still fits, but you need to stretch it a little bit, rather than it fitting comfortably draped over the sides. Still good quality though, and we'll keep it cuz it does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very nice and fits my 7' pool table perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This cover is exactly what I needed! The quality is very nice and fits my 7' pool table perfectly. I've had it about 2 weeks and the creases are slowly fading. I expected it to have them since it comes folded and it's plastic. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this cover - much nicer than what I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: This 7 foot pool table cover is excellent. I would give it more then 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: This 7 foot pool table cover is excellent. I would give it more then 5 stars if I could. It really looks like it would cost several hundred.Larry in Phoenix
customer_reviews.author: wolfhound

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well and fits good keeps things off the pool table
customer_reviews.author: K&T D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover. Good and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover. Good and durable. I use this on an outdoor table and it has held up great under strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Large

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and looks awesome. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Stays on the table even with two cats ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Stays on the table even with two cats climbing all over it. So far holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: High quality and beautiful. It makes the table look high dollar and is heavy and better quality than I would have thought. A pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Rusgirl01

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heavy cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Almost looks like real leather. Going to try to get the wrinkles out this weekend. But either way, i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heavyweight cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavyweight cover that lays flat and has no wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Brian&Judy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and fit nicely on my bar table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice thick cover.. hangs way over on my 6 foot table though
customer_reviews.author: acm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cover
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I expected after reading people's comments. Yes, it stinks like vinyl after opening, but that goes away after 2 days. It does hang over my 7 ft table, but it doesn't look bad. Color is nice, blends in well. My cats still sit on it, though, but at least I know they won't be able to claw through it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Buczek

product_meta.title: Iszy Billiards 7 Foot Heavy Duty Fitted Leatherette Pool Table Billiard Cover Several Colors to Choose From
product_meta.description: Burgundy color - Total measurements are 106 " L X 66 " wide - Measurements without drape is 91" L X 51" W - Fits most 7 foot tables - Made of heavy duty vinyl
feature_bullets: 7 foot heavy duty pool table cover
Amber color - Total measurements are 106 " L X 66 wide
Measurements without drape is 91" L X 51" W - Fits most 7 foot tables
Cotton backing - Made of heavy duty vinyl
